en.name: KPI with Sparkline (flexible)
en.description: KPI with Sparkline flexible Widget using jQuery Sparkline plug-in.
en.icon_tooltip: KPI with Sparkline flexible Widget using jQuery Sparkline plug-in.

type._tooltip: Change the charttype of the sparkline chart

color._translation: Set font color - NOT IN USE
color._tooltip: NOT IN USE - Change the color on every element separately

fontSize._tooltip: Set font size

fontStyle._tooltip: Set font size
fontStyle._valueTooltip: Default normal

setCDN._translation: Enable regional number format - not visible in Designer
setCDN._tooltip: Changes the thousand and decimal separator to the WebFOCUS system setting - not visible in Designer

squareDesign._tooltip: The extension will be in a square design with four lines instead of two lines

aggregateValues._tooltip: All month values will be aggregated in total value, change and sparkline

fontWeight._tooltip: Set font weight for the measure name

color._tooltip: Set font color for the measure name

fontSize._tooltip: Set font size for the measure name

fontStyle._tooltip: Set font style for the measure name
fontStyle._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font style)

color._tooltip: Set font color for the deviation vs previous

fontSize._tooltip: Set font size for the deviation vs previous

fontStyle._tooltip: Set font style for the deviation vs previous
fontStyle._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font style)

decimalPlaces._tooltip: Set decimal places for the deviation vs previous

deviationInPercent._tooltip: Show deviation vs previous as percent value

deviationTimeframe._tooltip: Change the deviation top previous text element

disableDeviation._tooltip: Completely hide the deviation vs previous element

abbreviateNumber._tooltip: Abbreviate the deviation vs previous number

fontWeight._tooltip: Set font weight for the total number
fontWeight._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font weight)

color._tooltip: Set font color for the total number

fontSize._tooltip: Set font size for the total number

fontStyle._tooltip: Set font style for the total number
fontStyle._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font style)

decimalPlaces._tooltip: Set decimal places for the total number

percentValue._tooltip: Show percent sign if total number is in percent

height._tooltip: Set height of the sparkline chart

width._tooltip: Set width of the sparkline chart

applyDynamicColorOn._tooltip: Apply the dynamic color function to the sparkline or the background

goodColor._tooltip: Color that should be shown if value is good

badColor._tooltip: Color that should be shown if value is bad

goodIs._tooltip: Limit that defines what is good and what is bad
